data.name: WelcomeAccountCaption
data.value: No features are limited by subscription, only storage capacity and can be changed at anytime.

data.name: AccountFreeDescription
AccountStandardDescription
data.value: Allows up to {2} clips of content and unlimited trash storage.

data.name: AccountUnlimitedDescription
data.value: Unrestricted and unlimited content and trash storage.

data.name: WelcomeDbPasswordCaption
data.value: Your privacy is important and clipboard data can be very personal. Storage is always encrypted but you can set a password that will be required in case your device is stolen or someone else is using your device.

data.name: WelcomeDragToOpenCaption
data.value: When enabled, dragging from any application to the top of the screen will reveal MonkeyPaste to easily drop content into MonkeyPaste.

data.name: WelcomeDragToOpenDescription1
data.value: Enabling the 'lock' in the top left of the main window will still allow dropping onto MonkeyPaste.

data.name: WelcomeDragToOpenDescription2
data.value: More window preferences are available from the 'Settings -> Preferences -> Window' menu.

data.name: WelcomeGestureProfileCaption
data.value: Keyboard shortcuts can be reviewed or changed at anytime from the 'Settings -> Shortcuts' menu.

data.name: WelcomeGestureProfileDescription1
data.value: All global shortcuts will be disabled so you can set them up yourself later.

data.name: WelcomeGestureProfileDescription2
data.value: MonkeyPaste's clipboard shortcuts will be available in all applications.

data.name: WelcomeGreetingCaption
data.value: Hey! Let's setup a few things to improve your overall experience with MonkeyPaste.

data.name: WelcomeLoginLoadCaption
data.value: To get the most use out of MonkeyPaste, loading automatically when you log in is a good idea. But, that's entirely up to you.

data.name: WelcomeScrollToOpenCaption
data.value: When enabled, a scroll gesture at the top of the screen will reveal MonkeyPaste.

data.name: WelcomeScrollToOpenDescription1
data.value: Left - clicking the taskbar icon will still open MonkeyPaste.

data.name: WelcomeScrollToOpenDescription2
data.value: More window preferences are available from the 'Settings -> Preferences -> Window' menu.

data.name: PluginBrowserNtfUninstallMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove '{0}' and all its presets and shortcuts?

data.value:
Next to delete!
Upgrade to avoid.

data.name: AccountNextTrashToolTipText
data.value:
Next to trash!
Upgrade to avoid.

data.name: ShortcutGestureRulesHint
data.value: Gestures must be unique and may only contain one input key.

data.name: WelcomeLoginLoadDescription2
data.value: Load up when this user account is logged in, not for other users.

data.name: EditorTemplateDateTimeHint
data.value: The current date and/or time will be substituted for DateTime templates when they are pasted.

data.name: ClipTilePasteButtonDisabledTooltip
data.value: Last active app unknown. Switch to intended app to monkey paste.

data.name: SettingsInteropUrlHintText
data.value: Source url recognition is dependant on how clipboard friendly the host application is so rejection cannot be guaranteed

data.name: SettingsInteropAppCopyShortcutHeaderHint
data.value:
Some MonkeyPaste features use keyboard automation to simulate 'Copy' events in other applications.
Add and/or select the app with the unique copy shortcut (like a console or shell for example) to ensure those features function properly.

data.name: SettingsInteropAppPasteShortcutHeaderHint
data.value:
Many MonkeyPaste features use keyboard automation to interact with other applications.
Some applications (like some consoles or shells for example) may have a non - default paste shortcut.
To ensure proper interoperability, record those shortcuts for that application here.

data.name: NtfRejectRemoveClipsBody
data.value: Would you also like to remove all {0} clips from '{1}'

data.name: SettingsInteropAppConfirmRemoveShortcutsBody
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove custom shortcuts for {0}?

data.name: SettingsInteropAppConfirmRemoveFormatsBody
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove custom formats for {0}?

data.name: SettingsInteropAppOleNoopReaderTooltip
data.value: There is no assigned clipboard formats for this app. No data will be read from it via cut/copy or attempting a drag - and - drop into MonkeyPaste

data.name: SettingsInteropAppOleNoopWriterTooltip
data.value: There is no assigned clipboard formats for this app. Automated paste or drag - and - drop from MonkeyPaste will have no affect (its empty data).

data.name: ShortcutsResetNtfMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts? All custom shortcuts will be removed.

data.name: ShortcutsRoutingProfileChangeNtfMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to change your shortcut routing profile to '{0}'

data.name: ShortcutAssignDuplicateWarning
data.value: This combination conflicts with '{0}' which will be cleared if saved.

data.name: ShortcutAssignGlobalHint
data.value: This is a global shortcut. That means it will attempt to execute whenever it is performed. Try to make it unique enough (or change the 'Routing Type') to not conflict with shortcuts from other applications.

data.name: ShortcutAssignInvalidGestureWarning
data.value: Shortcut must contain ONE and only ONE non - modifier key.

data.value: Check your connection and try again.

data.name: TermsOutroPluginText

data.name: ShortcutAssignExclusiveOverrideMultiKeyWarning
data.value: Exclusive override shortcuts may only contain ONE key and that key can not be a modifier key.

data.name: WelcomeRememberDbPasswordTooltip
data.value: Note! This password is optional and only for EXTRA security. Your data is already encrypted and never shared. This password simply prevents someone whose not you from loading MonkeyPaste if they somehow gain access to your desktop (stolen, you leave the room, etc.).

data.name: PinTrayEmptyLabel
data.value: Pin or Drop any media here!

data.name: SearchColorDistanceToolTipText
data.value:
Thresholds above 0 will provide fuzzy color matching using Euclidean distance in the RGBA colorspace.
For example, if red (#FF0000) is the search term and black (#000000) is a pixel in an Image Clip, then the color distance will be 255. Black to white distance is the maximum possible of 510, including an alpha channel

data.name: SearchCustomJoinHeaderLabel
data.value: all of the following are true

data.name: PrefRegistrationFrameHint
data.value: Registration lets you carry your paid subscription across all your devices (upon availability). We won't spam your email we promise 😇.

data.name: PrefAutoSearchHint
data.value: Text typed will be automatically applied to a search when no text box is focused.

data.name: PrefDestFormatHint
data.value: When true, external content inserted into a clip will use the clips formatting and not what's available from the source.

data.name: PrefDestFormatLabel
data.value: Paste, drop or append with destination formatting

data.name: PrefForgetDbPwdNtfText
data.value: Are you sure you want to forget the password?

data.name: PrefIgnoreAppendsHint
data.value: When new clipboard content is appended it will not be tracked as a new clip

data.name: PrefIgnoreDupHint
data.value: When the clipboard matches an existing clip, that clip will be used instead of creating a new one

data.name: PrefIgnoreInternalClipboardHint
data.value: Clipboard changes from within the app will not be tracked

data.name: PrefIgnoreWhiteSpaceHint
data.value: Spaces, tabs and new lines will be ignored from tracking

data.name: PrefMainWindowShowOnScrollHint
data.value: The main window will be revealed by performing a scroll gesture on the top edge of your monitor

data.name: PrefPasteHistoryHint
data.value: This setting will track system - wide keyboard paste counts for usage statistics. This information is private and not shared but also not guarenteed. Accurate results may require providing a application specific keyboard paste command in 'Settings -> Copy & Paste -> Shortcuts'.

data.name: PrefPinTrayCapacityHint
data.value: Too many pinned clips (like browser tabs) can consume significant memory. removal is by first - in - first - out

data.name: PrefRecentTextLimitHint

data.name: ActionSetClipboardHint
data.value: Sets the clipboard to the input clip.

data.name: ActionAlertHint
data.value: General purpose sound and/or system tray message alerts. Alert action's have no affect on their input.

data.name: ActionAlertShowTimeHint
data.value: Time toast message is shown in seconds. When value is 0 message must be closed manually.

data.name: ActionAnalyzerHint
data.value: Processes its input clip using the assigned Analyzer Preset.

data.name: ActionClassifyActionHint
data.value: Input content is linked to the selected collection

data.name: ActionClassifyHint
data.value: Links its input clip to the assigned Tag Collection.

data.name: ActionCondDataHint
data.value: This can be static text to compare with the input and/or include selected properties (via the filter button) will be substituted when the condition is evaluated.

data.name: ActionCondInFilterHint
data.value: An optional JSONPath query that will be applied to the selected 'Input Property' before the condition is evaluated.

data.name: ActionCondInPropHint
data.value:
The clip property used for this Conditional.
The 'Last Output' property is currently only supported when this Conditional is a child of an Analyzer action and the provided data will vary depending on the output of the parent Analyzer.
For troubleshooting, attach an 'Alert Action' to this Conditional's parent and set the Alert's 'Message' parameter to match this Input Property. This will allow to review the actual data being used for this Conditional.

data.name: ActionConditionalHint
data.value: Performs a text comparision on the input clip or previous action output. When comparision fails (its not a match) no child actions will be executed. So it acts like a logical gate.

data.name: ActionCondOpHint
data.value: All true or false operations where child actions will only execute if the result is true.

data.name: ActionContentAddHint
data.value: Triggered when a clip of the selected type is added to the system in any way (clipboard, drag - and - drop, analyzer generated or duplicated).

data.name: ActionContentAddIgnoreDupHint
data.value: Only execute this trigger if input clip is new and not a duplicate. This is independant of any preference setting of whether new content is ignored or not.

data.name: ActionContentAddTriggerHint
data.value: Only clips of this type will trigger this action.

data.name: ActionContentTaggedHint
data.value: Links its input clip to the assigned Tag Collection.

data.name: ActionContentTaggedTriggerHint
data.value: Triggered when a clip is linked to the specified Tag Collection.

data.name: ActionDelayActionHint
data.value: The amount of time in milliseconds waited before children execute

data.name: ActionDelayHint
data.value: (Experimental) Primarily used in conjunction with the Repeater Action for polling remote sources or aid with long running operations.

data.name: ActionFileWriteCustomNameHint
data.value: When left blank, the output file will use the input clip's title as the file name.

data.name: ActionFileWriteDirHint
data.value: The directory where the file will be written.

data.name: ActionFileWriterHint
data.value: Saves input to the selected folder.

data.name: ActionFolderWatcherHint
data.value: Triggered when the selected folder's content changes. The output will be a new or existing (when the Ignore Duplicates preference is enabled) File Clip of the file or folder that has changed along with the type of change as its last output.

data.name: ActionRepeatCountHint
data.value: A value of 0 will repeat parent action indefinitely

data.name: ActionRepeatDelayHint
data.value: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait once parent action completes

data.name: ActionRepeaterHint
data.value: (Experimental) Used for creating action loops or repetive tasks. When repeated, it will execute all children again with its original input. When using an interval without a repeat count, the trigger will need to be disabled and reenabled to halt the repeating. Can be useful for polling or web scraping automation.

data.name: ActionShortcutTriggerHint
data.value:
Triggered by a global shortcut you define. If MonkeyPaste is active it will attempt to use the selected clip (if there is one) as input. Otherwise it will try to use the clipboard as its input.
Note: a Shortcut Trigger will still execute if there is no input to keep it flexible (so it can be a macro trigger etc.) since its not a data - driven event.

data.name: ActionShortcutTriggerTriggerHint
data.value: Triggered when the recorded shortcut is pressed at anytime with the current clipboard

data.name: PrefRestartConfirmNtfText
data.value: This action requires the app to restart. Would you like to do that now?

data.name: RestarterErrorNtfText
data.value: There was a problem. You need to manually restart the application.

data.name: CommonReadOnlyElmDisabledToolTip
data.value: Built in elements are read - only. Duplicate to alter.

data.name: PrefShowWindowAndLockHint
data.value:
Like scrolling along the top screen edge to open, this will lock the main window when it opens. Allowing for quicker multi - targeted workflows.
* Corners are in terms of all your screens, not per monitor.

data.name: ClipTrayDeleteAllMessageText
data.value:
Are you sure you want to delete ALL your clips?!

data.name: NtfRateAppText
data.value: I'm an indy dev please show some support!

data.name: AppModeToggleLeftClickCopyHint
data.value: Auto Copy Mode - simulates a 'Copy' event every time the left mouse button is released.

data.name: AppModeToggleRightClickPasteHint
data.value: Right Click Paste Mode - simulates a 'Paste' event every time the right mouse button is released

data.name: ActionAnalyzerChildInputParamHint
data.value: Analyzers annotate their input or create new clips as output. Children of analyzers need to decide which one they need as their input. This typically is the Last Output.

data.name: ActionCondNotHint
data.value: When checked the true or false outcome of the condition will be flipped. So for example, a 'Contains' condition will become 'Does Not Contain'.

data.name: ActionMonkeyCopyTriggerHint
data.value: Like a Shortcut Trigger but when the key combination is pressed, a 'Copy' event will be simulated in the active application so it still works like copy but then the chain of actions attached to the Monkey Copy Trigger will get executed in the background using the simulated copy clipboard data.

data.name: ActionSetClipboardContentHint
data.value: (Optional) When left empty the clipboard will be set using this action's input. Anything provided here will be treated as plain text only.

data.name: ActionSetClipboardIgnoreChangeHint
data.value: When true, no clip will be added after this action sets the clipboard.

data.value: Parent '{0}' filters only for '{1}' type content and analyzer '{2}' will never execute because it does not support '{3}' type of input

data.name: AppendCannotActivateText
data.value: To append you must unpause the clipboard listener (System Tray -> Resume).

data.name: WelcomeTranslatedMessage
data.value:
I only speak English and MonkeyPaste has been translated into this language.
All versions ship with the English pack so if you speak English you can change the language to it at anytime after this setup (Settings -> Preferences -> International).
If you would like to help improve the translation we would love to hear from you!
feedback@monkeypaste.com

data.name: CommonOutOfDateTooltip
data.value: You need to update MonkeyPaste in order to use this feature.

data.name: ActionCondLastOutputUnavailableInvalidText
data.value: Parent action '{0}' does not support input property type 'Last Output'

data.name: EditorTemplateContactHint
data.value:
Using available contacts (requires a fetcher plugin) this field will be used for all instances of this template across this document or in any it will be referenced in later.

So for example if select email address here then the email field of the contact you select will be used for all instances in this document.

data.name: EditorTemplateDateTimeCustomHint
data.value:
yy = short year
yyyy = long year
M = month (1-12)
MM = month (01-12)
MMM = month abbreviation (Jan, Feb ... Dec)
MMMM = long month (January, February ... December)
d = day (1 - 31)
dd = day (01 - 31)
ddd = day of the week in words (Monday, Tuesday ... Sunday)
E = short day of the week in words (Mon, Tue ... Sun)
D - Ordinal day (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 21st, 22nd, 23rd, 31st, 4th...)
h = hour in am/pm (0-12)
hh = hour in am/pm (00-12)
H = hour in day (0-23)
HH = hour in day (00-23)
mm = minute
ss = second
SSS = milliseconds
a = AM/PM marker
p = a.m./p.m. marker

data.name: EditorTemplateDynamicHint
data.value: All occurances of this template will use the provided text.

data.name: EditorTemplateStaticHint
data.value: All occurances of this template will use the provided text.

data.name: PrefResetClipboardHint
data.value: Monkey Paste sets the clipboard (overrides) when pasting to an external program. This will attempt to restore the state of the clipboard after an external paste. Total restoration cannot be guaranteed and may reduce performance or even crash MonkeyPaste depending on the source of the data.

data.name: SettingsInteropAppOleFormatsHeaderHint
data.value: Only the selected presets will be used for the specified application. When unspecified, the default presets found in the Clipboard Sidebar will be used.

data.name: SettingsInteropAppRejectHeaderHint
data.value: All clipboard monitoring from rejected applications will be ignored.

data.name: ShortcutRoutingProfileTypeHint
data.value:
• InternalAll shortcuts are limited to within the application. This is not really an intended option but can allow to customize what shortcuts you intend to make globalsomeday.
  • Default All global shortcuts are enabled. TheShow/Hide Main Windowshortcut usesoverriderouting for theCaps Lock key. You can change that routing or gesture at any time. Butgive it a try

data.name: ShortcutRoutingTypeHint
data.value:
Global Shortcut Modes

  • Passive A shortcut MonkeyPaste will listen for in any application.
    *This is the only option on Linux for now.
  • Pre Shortcut will execute before it is handled by the active application.
  • Post Shortcut will execute after it is handled by the active application.
  • Override When MonkeyPaste hears the input key (non - modifier key) of an override shortcut it will hide that key press from application - level input.
    This option will guarantee the shortcut is triggered without conflicts to the active application.
  • Exclusive Override This is a special type of override mode designed for the Caps Lock key. It only allows one key (non - modifier) for its assignment.
    In normal override mode Caps Lock can become stuck on when pressed in combination with other keys.
    So no matter what other keys are down, if a Hotkey shortcut is pressed it will be overriden and prevent it from becoming stuck on.

data.name: WelcomeDragToOpenFakeWindowDetail
data.value: MonkeyPaste is

data.name: WelcomeScrollToOpenFakeWindowDetail
data.value:
This way, MonkeyPaste can be accessed
without a click or even batting an eye 👀
